title: Villagers-RELOADED
description:
nERv

Villagers (c) Avanquest Software Publishing Ltd

03/2016 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Indie, Simulation
Strategy

Villagers is a beautifully illustrated and richly detailed town-building
game where you build a thriving community using the people and resources
around you. Success or failure depends on your ability to create a town
that can grow and prosper, and overcome the harsh realities of medieval
life!

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
